name: Diving Expeditions Playa
description: Our 2-tank scuba diving trips in Playa del Carmen are our most popular offering.  These trips will take you to the best dive sites in Playa del Carmen, including wreck dives, reef dives, and more.  Sights may include moray eels, stingrays, giant grouper, sea turtles, reef and nurse sharks, spiny lobsters, and huge schools of tropical fish, among many other potential sights.  Turtles are a very common and always fun sighting during dives in Playa del Carmen.
